member.name: T:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter
member.summary: A control that can be used to either preview or print a paginated collection.

member.name: F:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.BodyTemplateProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the template for the body of each page. This usually contains some sort of collection-displaying control that grows as more items are added to the CurrentPrintContext.CurrentItems collection.

member.name: F:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.CanPrintProperty
member.summary: Gets whether the control is ready for printing.

member.name: F:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.CurrentPageIndexProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the page being displayed by the control.

member.name: F:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.CurrentPrintContextProperty
member.summary: Gets the CollectionPrintContext for the page being printed or displayed.

member.name: F:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.CurrentlyPrintingPageProperty
member.summary: Gets the one-based index of the page being printed.

member.name: F:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.CurrentlySpoolingPageProperty
member.summary: Gets the one-based index of the page being spooled.

member.name: F:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.FooterTemplateProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the template that will be used for the footer of each page.

member.name: F:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.HeaderTemplateProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the template that will be used for the header of each page.

member.name: F:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.IgnoreHorizontalOverflowProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the CollectionPrinter should ignore overflow in the horizontal direction when paginating.

member.name: F:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.IsPrintingProperty
member.summary: Gets whether the CollectionPrinter is currently printing.

member.name: F:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.ItemTemplateProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the template for each item (used in the default ItemsControl-based template for the CollectionPrinter).

member.name: F:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.ItemsPanelProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the ItemsPanelTemplate for the ItemsControl-based default template for printing.

member.name: F:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.ItemsSourceProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection to be printed.

member.name: F:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.MaximumItemsPerPageProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of items to place on a page. Set this value to -1 to print as many items as possible on the page.

member.name: F:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.PageBackgroundTemplateProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the template for the background of each page.

member.name: F:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.PrintDocumentNameProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the document to be printed.

member.name: M:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a CollectionPrinter.

member.name: M:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.OnApplyTemplate
member.summary: Called when a template is applied to the control.

member.name: M:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.Print
member.summary: Prints a document from end to end.

member.name: M:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.Print(System.Windows.Printing.PrintDocument)
member.summary: Prints the collection into an existing PrintDocument. The CollectionPrinter will never set HasMorePages to be true -- that is left to the original creator of the PrintDocument.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.BodyTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template for the body of each page. This usually contains some sort of collection-displaying control that grows as more items are added to the CurrentPrintContext.CurrentItems collection.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.CanPrint
member.summary: Gets whether the control is ready for printing.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.CurrentPageIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the page being displayed by the control.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.CurrentPrintContext
member.summary: Gets the CollectionPrintContext for the page being printed or displayed.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.CurrentlyPrintingPage
member.summary: Gets the one-based index of the page being printed.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.CurrentlySpoolingPage
member.summary: Gets the one-based index of the page being spooled.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.FooterTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template that will be used for the footer of each page.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.HeaderTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template that will be used for the header of each page.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.IgnoreHorizontalOverflow
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the CollectionPrinter should ignore overflow in the horizontal direction when paginating.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.IsPrinting
member.summary: Gets whether the CollectionPrinter is currently printing.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.ItemTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template for each item (used in the default ItemsControl-based template for the CollectionPrinter).

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.ItemsPanel
member.summary: Gets or sets the ItemsPanelTemplate for the ItemsControl-based default template for printing.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.ItemsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection to be printed.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.MaximumItemsPerPage
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of items to place on a page. Set this value to -1 to print as many items as possible on the page.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.PageBackgroundTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template for the background of each page.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.PrintCommand
member.summary: A command that will cause printing to occur when executed.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrinter.PrintDocumentName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the document to be printed.

member.name: T:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrintContext
member.summary: Represents the context for a page that is being printed, containing such information as items to be printed, page number, page count, page size, and margins.

member.name: M:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrintContext.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a CollectionPrintContext.
member.param: Specifies a host for the context (usually a control such as the CollectionPrinter).

member.name: M:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrintContext.NotifyPropertiesChanged
member.summary: Raises property change notifications for all properties, forcing a binding refresh.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrintContext.Host
member.summary: Gets the host for the CollectionPrintContext (usually a control such as the CollectionPrinter).

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrintContext.PrintableArea
member.summary: Gets the PrintableArea for the printing page.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrintContext.PageMargins
member.summary: Gets the PageMargins for the printing page.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrintContext.FirstItemIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the first item in the source collection.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrintContext.FirstItem
member.summary: Gets the one-based index of the first item in the source collection.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrintContext.FirstItemValue
member.summary: Gets the value of the first item on the page.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrintContext.LastItemIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the last item in the source collection.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrintContext.LastItem
member.summary: Gets the one-based index of the last item in the source collection.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrintContext.LastItemValue
member.summary: Gets the value of the last item on the page.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrintContext.CurrentItems
member.summary: Gets the set of items that should be displayed on the current page.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrintContext.CurrentPageIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the current page.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrintContext.CurrentPage
member.summary: Gets the one-based index of the current page.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrintContext.PageCount
member.summary: Gets the total number of pages in the print job. This value will be null if this number cannot be calculated without printing timing out.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrintContext.IsLastPage
member.summary: Gets whether this page is the last page in the print job.

member.name: P:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrintContext.IsFirstPage
member.summary: Gets whether this page is the first page in the print job.

member.name: E:SLaB.Printing.Controls.CollectionPrintContext.PropertyChanged
member.summary: An event raised when a property's value changes.
